data.body: There's no include file "afxres.h" in visual studio 2015 Enterprise version, so that change it to "winresrc.h"

adds tvOS support

Ported tests:
- js-tests
- cpp-tsts
- lua-tests
- game-controller tests

all of them working, but most of the tests can't be navigated
since they expect a controller.

data.title: Allow same components to be added multiple times
data.body:
With this change if a component with the same name is added multiple times e.g. PhysicsBody, it won't assert, instead it will replace the old component with the new.

Different approach to https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14371

data.title: fix layout backimage size error with newest scale9sprite
data.body: @zilongshanren This PR just compatible with old size logic, Please review this PR, thanks.

data.title: [ci skip] Bug fix
data.body:
Both Image/blocks9ss.plist and animations/grossini.plist have image frames grossini_dance__.png, and in Image/blocks9ss.plist the frames is smaller than frames in animations/grossini.plist, so if load Image/blocks9ss.plist first, the samples use frames named grossini_dance__.png in animations/grossini.plist will crash. After check in source file, we found these frames in Image/blocks9ss.plist hasn't been used, so we changed frames name in Image/blocks9ss.plist to avoid crash.

@zilongshanren @pandamicro Please review this PR

data.title: label can not view normal
remove error logic for BMFont with newest CCLabel
Proper Casing for Node Callback Getters and Setters
data.body:
The casing isn't consistent across getters and setters for callbacks in CCNode.
I'm probably missing updates elsewhere in the codebase, but this is mostly a suggestion.

data.title: Please don't merge, because it just be test case for bug.
Fix method name spelling in AutoPolygon
data.body:
I found a small mistake in the `AutoPolygon` class and renamed one:
- `getTriaglesCount` => `getTrianglesCount`

Also I've marked the old functions as deprecated, so there's no breaking changes in the API.
